articles.author: News9 Technology Desk
articles.title: Fortnite to come back on iPhone following Apple’s new App Store policies in Europe - News9 LIVE
articles.description: Following the EU’s Digital Markets Act, Apple will allow sideloaded apps and third-party app stores on iOS from March 2024. Epic Games announced that it will be bringing Fortnite to the iPhone in Europe as it could become an app store on iOS in the EU.
articles.content: Following Apple’s announcement to allow sideloaded apps and third-party app stores on iOS in the EU, Fortnite has been confirmed to make a return on the iPhone in Europe. Since Apple is chasing a dea… [+1721 chars]

articles.content:
Indias Tata Group and Europes Airbus have signed an agreement to manufacture civilian helicopters together.
